text: Flucetorex (INN) is an amphetamine, which was investigated as an anorectic, but does not appear to have ever been marketed. It is related to fenfluramine. ==See also== * Benfluorex * Fludorex * Tiflorex ==References== Category:Acetamides Category:Substituted amphetamines Category:Anorectics Category:Trifluoromethyl compounds Category:Serotonin releasing agents Category:Abandoned drugs
title: Flucetorex
